name: HSP_BFH_ACT_COD_FLAGS_RMV
description: This table extracts the coding flags that are listed as removed in the Billing History. It should be used in conjunction with table HSP_BFH_ACTIVITY.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ACTION_FLAGS_RMV_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the coding flags that were removed via the Modify Coding Flags account action.
entries: Pull Info executed by Nightly Processing
Review needed - linked problem changed in another encounter
Review needed - some diagnoses added directly on the source account were not merged
Review needed - merge from outpatient source hospital account
Review needed - linked clinical problem failed to update
